entry.title: Amplify Shader Pack
entry.content:
180+ Amplify Shader Editor samples for HDRP, URP, and Built-in Renderer.

FREE FOR Amplify Shader Editor OWNERS.

Checkout at no cost, be sure to use the same account that has your ASE license.


SAVE 35% ON Amplify Bundle

Amplify Shader Editor - Award-winning node-based shader editor

Amplify Impostors - 1-Click Impostor Creator

Amplify LUT Pack - 200+ LUT Grading Presets


LATEST HIGHLIGHTS

• Updated per ASE editor v1.9.8

• Updated support for Unity 6

• Optimized package size

• Added preview support for URP/HDRP 17x

• Added new sample Refraction HDRP

• Added support for URP/HDRP 16x

• Added support for URP/HDRP 15x

• Added support for URP/HDRP 14x

• Fixed all samples for URP/HDRP 10x and 12x

• Built with Amplify Shader Editor v1.9.2

• Improved Start Screen sample importer


IMPORTANT

• Raised minimum Unity support to 2019.4 LTS

• Raised minimum URP support to 10x

• Raised minimum HDRP support to 10x


Over 180 curated shaders made with Amplify Shader Editor, ready to use and fully editable. From basic shader types, varied VFX such as Dissolves and Deformations, to specific Terrain examples and custom purpose shaders with supporting scripts.


Editor not required to use, only needed to edit/update

• HDRP, URP, and Built-in Renderer

• Fully Customizable


Chec our sample catalogue at Official Wiki. A great starting point to develop your own shaders, you can make them your own with our award-winning shader editor. Add new effects, change properties or convert between renderers, there are no limits to what you can tweak.


TECHNICAL CONSIDERATIONS

These shaders have been created with Unity 2019.4. Built-in shaders will work with any Unity version.


Includes HDRP/URP shaders been created for versions 10 to 16. You need Amplify Shader Editor to update these shaders in order to make them work properly with other SRP versions. The included shader will be updated whenever necessary, depending on future SRP changes.


Using HDRP/URP shaders with an unsupported SRP version, without updating them, will likely render incorrectly or show as Pink/Magenta. This is expected, shaders must be open with the editor and saved to automatically update them to a different supported SRP version.


** Amplify Shader Editor sold separately **


For additional details on Amplify Shader Editor, check our Overview Video and Manual.


Make the change, use the professional tools you crave. Our products are developed by industry professionals and our support team always goes one step beyond to resolve any possible issues our clients might have.


Get in touch, we would love to hear your story, help promote and feature your work.

entry.title: Amplify Shader Pack
entry.content:
180+ Amplify Shader Editor 示例，适用于 HDRP、URP 和内置渲染器。

对 Amplify Shader Editor 用户免费。

无需费用，确保使用与您的 ASE 许可证相同的账户进行结账。

在 Amplify Bundle 上节省 35%。

Amplify Shader Editor - 获奖的基于节点的着色器编辑器

Amplify Impostors - 一键伪装创建器

Amplify LUT Pack - 200+ LUT 调色预设

最新亮点

• 根据 ASE 编辑器 v1.9.8 更新

• 更新对 Unity 6 的支持

• 优化包大小

• 为 URP/HDRP 17x 添加了预览支持

• 添加了新的示例折射 HDRP

• 添加了对 URP/HDRP 16x 的支持

• 添加了对 URP/HDRP 15x 的支持

• 添加了对 URP/HDRP 14x 的支持

• 修复了所有 URP/HDRP 10x 和 12x 的示例

• 使用 Amplify Shader Editor v1.9.2 构建

• 改进了开始屏幕示例导入器

重要信息

• 将最低 Unity 支持提升至 2019.4 LTS

• 将最低 URP 支持提升至 10x

• 将最低 HDRP 支持提升至 10x


超过180个使用Amplify Shader Editor制作的精心挑选的着色器，随时可用且完全可编辑。从基本着色器类型、各种视觉特效（如溶解和变形），到特定的地形示例和具有支持脚本的自定义用途着色器。

不需要编辑器即可使用，仅在需要编辑/更新时使用

• HDRP、URP和内置渲染器

• 完全可定制

请查看我们的样本目录，访问官方维基。这是开发您自己着色器的一个很好的起点，您可以使用我们屡获殊荣的着色器编辑器将其个性化。添加新效果、改变属性或在渲染器之间转换，您可以调整的内容没有限制。

技术考虑

这些着色器是使用Unity 2019.4创建的。内置着色器将与任何Unity版本兼容。

包括为版本10到16创建的HDRP/URP着色器。您需要Amplify Shader Editor来更新这些着色器，以使其与其他SRP版本正常工作。所包含的着色器将在未来SRP更改时根据需要进行更新。

使用HDRP/URP着色器与不受支持的SRP版本，且未进行更新，可能会导致渲染不正确或显示为粉色/洋红色。这是预期的，着色器必须在编辑器中打开并保存，以便自动更新到不同的受支持SRP版本。

** Amplify Shader Editor单独出售 **

有关Amplify Shader Editor的更多详细信息，请查看我们的概述视频和手册。


进行更改，使用您渴望的专业工具。我们的产品由行业专业人士开发，我们的支持团队始终超越一步，以解决客户可能遇到的任何问题。

联系我们，我们很想听听您的故事，帮助推广和展示您的作品。

entry.title: Support package for Hovl Studio assets
entry.content:
This package provides URP and HDRP support for Hovl Studio assets (And possible future new Render Pipelines).

This asset is FREE if you have one of Hovl Studio assets.


The editor replaces shaders that works only with standard render pipeline to custom pipelines in all materials.


The editor works only with assets from Hovl Studio!

Tutorial how to use it


This asset also includes free Distortion shaders for URP(LWRP) and HDRP 2019.2+ and many usefull shaders.

entry.title: Support package for Hovl Studio assets
entry.content:
此包为Hovl Studio资产提供URP和HDRP支持（以及未来可能的新渲染管线）。

如果您拥有Hovl Studio的资产，则此资产是免费的。

该编辑器将仅与标准渲染管线兼容的着色器替换为所有材质中的自定义管线。

该编辑器仅适用于来自Hovl Studio的资产！

使用教程

此资产还包括适用于URP（LWRP）和HDRP 2019.2+的免费扭曲着色器以及许多实用的着色器。
